content: 2 3ch * 3dc 2 chain 3 double_crochet in the 2ch from the previous round 1 double_crochet in the 1 double_crochet form the previous round* repeat from * to end turn round 3 repeat round 2 round 4 3ch * 3 double_crochet 2 chain 3 double_crochet in 2 chain from the previous round 2 double_crochet in 1 double_crochet from the previous round* repeat from * to end turn round 5-7 repeat round 4 round 8 3 chain * 3 double_crochet 2 chain 3 double_crochet 2 chain from the precious round 2 double_crochet in first double_crochet from the 2 double_crochet from previous round 1 double_crochet in the second double_crochet from the 2 double_crochet from previous round* repeat from * to end turn round 9 24 repeat round 8 the shell pattern in detail © vendula maderska 2013 the thank you ♥ february 2013 8 magic with hook and needles w ww vendulkam blogspot com instruction size 3 years old child starting at the neckline chain 101 round 1 double_crochet into the 4th chain from the hook the first 3 chain count as the 1st double_crochet here and throughout then double_crochet into every stitch across 97 double_crochet turn work round 2 1 chain single_crochet into each
